item.title: [266] Nintendo reserves the right to brick your console following "unauthorised use"
item.description:
>https://www.eurogamer.net/nintendo-reserves-the-right-to-brick-your-console-following-unauthorised-use-in-bid-to-prevent-piracy
Unauthorized use may include any modification to the original hardware configuration, as well as the official console software or installation of unauthorized applications.
Game Chat footage also recorded to ensure a "safe and family-friendly online environment" and violation of policy may result in permanently deactivation of the device.

item.title: [399] Xenoblade
item.description:
I think action combat going forward is the logical choice. The MMO faux style combat just needs to go. They've taken it as far as it can go and I've had my fill of it. People just don't like it. I'm tired of the series not gaining a footing with more gamers cause they hate the combat.

Nobody is doing that MMO style because 1.) It's dated, and 2.) Its not compatible with a wider audience. It's not "unique" either, it's a system lifted straight out of MMOs.

I don't *hate* the Xenoblade combat, but I also wouldn't miss it. It's not the sole reason I play Xenoblade. There's so much more to these games than just it's combat. Most of the mechanics can be translated into an action battle system anyway.

Original filename: featured-image-every-game-in-the-xenoblade-series-ranked.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [181] Viv could've had a more interesting story if she portrayed her demons in Helluv
item.description:
Viv could've had a more interesting story if she portrayed her demons in Helluva Boss existing under an oppressive culture that rewards cruelty and cynicism while discouraging sincere affection and love resulting in many hellborn quickly melting in response to genuine empathy like viltrumites. It would have even fit her liberal ideals of fighting against oppressive power structures. I find it notable and odd then that her characters not only rub elbows with those in power so often but that said authority figures are portrayed so sympathetically and benevolently. We still see shades of her wanting to portray Blitzo as a "working class hero" but the narrative she set up is (unsurprisingly) schizophrenic and directionless.
Also Stolas is a shit.

Original filename: nword.png
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 54] US-UK Trade Deal
item.description:
UK and US announce trade deal to save thousands of British jobs, Starmer says

https://news.sky.com/story/uk-and-us-agree-trade-deal-as-starmer-and-trump-make-announcement-in-live-phone-call-13363710

The UK and US have agreed a trade deal, with Sir Keir Starmer and Donald Trump confirming the announcement during a live televised phone call.

It is the first trade deal agreed after Mr Trump began his second presidential term in January, and after he imposed strict tariffs on countries around the world in April.

Sir Keir said the "first-of-a-kind" deal with the US will save thousands of jobs across the UK, boost British business and protect British industry.

Original filename: starmer_trump.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 77] /tpg/ /rcg/ - Theme Park & Roller Coaster General
item.description:
Disneyland Abu Dhabi Edition

>Last Thread: >>2779327

>What is this thread? Why are there two companies?
Disney parks were initially founded as a way to celebrate the culture and history of America and provide middle class families with a fun-filled immersive experience. While theme parks are the main focus of these threads (and the title of the general) there is also discussion on other roller coasters & rides, as well as the parks themselves and trip planning too. That's where /rcg/ comes in.
>Can I talk about Disney/Universal parks in this thread?
Absolutely! Disney and Universal are currently competing for the Orlando theme park market and beyond! Universal is opening new resorts all around the US and new continents!

Thread Pro Tip: Talk about theme parks!

Park Crowd Tracker:
>https://queue-times.com/en-US/parks

Roller Coaster Database:
>https://rcdb.com/

Amusement Park News Sites:
>https://www.themeparkinsider.com/
>https://www.screamscape.com/
>https://www.coaster101.com/

Disney Park News:
>https://www.wdwnt.com/
>https://www.wdwmagic.com/
>https://www.allears.net
>https://www.mousesteps.com

item.title: [ 48] /tpg/ - ThinkPad General
item.description:
>>105078969
Don't buy anything OTHER THAN IBM/Lenovo ThinkPad T, X, and W/P Series if you want the Real Business Experience™
>Other business laptops are welcome in /tpg/ (Dell Latitude/Precision, HP EliteBook/ZBook)

Why ThinkPad?
>Used machines are plentiful and cheap
>Excellent keyboards, tactile feel and quiet
>Great durability: magnesium roll cage for structural integrity, with high quality plastic body panels
>Utilitarian design: e.g. indicator LEDs, 7 row keyboard layout on older models
>Docking stations that easily turns your laptop into a desktop
>Easy to repair (most models), upgrade & maintain thanks to readily available service manuals for every model, spare parts easy & cheap to obtain
>Excellent Linux & *BSD support

ThinkWiki - General info about ThinkPads/specs
https://www.thinkwiki.org/wiki/ThinkWiki

Model generations:
>Classic IBM: T40, T41, T42
>IBM/Lenovo Transition: T43, T60, T61 (T42 - T43: significant difference in specs)
>"Classic" Lenovo: T400, T410, T420 (T61 - T400: 4:3 to 16:10)
>Transition to old modern: T430, T440, T450 (T420 - T430: membrane to chiclet)
>Old modern: T460, T470, T480 (T450 - T460: significantly less thick)
>New modern: T490, T14g1, T14g2 (T480 - T490: design change)
>New new modern: T14g3, T14g4, ... (T14g2 - T14g3: second design change)

BIOS replacement:
https://coreboot.org/downloads.html
https://libreboot.org/docs/install/
https://canoeboot.org/docs/install/

Additional resources:
https://dankpads.com/tpg/
https://biosimage.booru.org
https://1vyra.in

Patches:
https://github.com/digmorepaka/thinkpad-firmware-patches
https://github.com/hamishcoleman/thinkpad-ec

Chat:
##ibmthinkpad on libera
#/tpg/ on rizon

item.title: [123] Millennial cuisine has been defined by shallow gimmicks, a very faux sentimenta
item.description:
Millennial cuisine has been defined by shallow gimmicks, a very faux sentimentality, and trying to reinvent the wheel (look to the burger/pizza restaurants they open) . Seemingly all of these things have led to a toxic culture of shallow presentation and verbose moralizing. Nothing good or great has come out of it other then the circus freaks who call themselves chiefs.
What will Zoomer cosine look like? I don't reckon it will be as gaudy or preachy as the Millennial but I am in no high hopes of any sort of major change. Ideally there will be a pre-1970 French cuisine revival but I won't hold my breath.

Original filename: gross.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 63] /SWF/ - Semper ViVet Flash
item.description:
Flash will live /f/orevar

Flash hacking, restoration, archival and resurrection general

ITT: We continue our attempts to convince the admin team to bring back /f/ from >>105082557

The current canonical idea I'm working on to that end is to build a new backend and verification library for /f/, to tackle the perceived reasons for bringing down /f/ listed in 4chan's blog:
https://blog.4chan.org/post/781845918774394880/still-standing

However admins are difficult to get in touch with on irc on the issue, so any ideas would be appreciated.

Status report: libswftag+swfcheck are now barely usable for uncompressed swfs. Progress from my end will be slower this week until friday but outside of the check_functions, the few remaining changes/improvements to the library will be made.

github.com/flash-computer/libswftag
github.com/flash-computer/swfcheck

There are still no php-anons to help build the backend however.

General stuff:

Tools:
>players
ruffle.rs/downloads
archive.org/details/flashplayer32_0r0_363_win_sa
github.com/Grubsic/Adobe-Flash-Player-Debug-Downloads-Archive

>decompiler/disassemblers
github.com/jindrapetrik/jpexs-decompiler
sourceforge.net/projects/flasm/
github.com/CyberShadow/RABCDAsm

>misc
www.swftools.org/download.html
github.com/Arkq/swfpack

Resources:
>AVM2
https://web.archive.org/web/20201130032433/https://www.adobe.com/content/dam/acom/en/devnet/pdf/avm2overview.pdf
https://jindrapetrik.github.io/as3_pcode_instructions.en.html

>Format spec:
https://web.archive.org/web/20210609225053/https://www.adobe.com/content/dam/acom/en/devnet/pdf/swf-file-format-spec.pdf

>AVM1 overview
https://open-flash.github.io/documentation/avm1/

>Tags/Structs
http://www.m2osw.com/swf_tags

item.title: [493] The Land of Nod: Rockabye Book Storytime
item.description:
>Jetcat is the world's youngest super-hero, attending school during the day and donning the mask and cape when the world is in trouble. Tutenstein is an Egyptian mummy, a boy kind who lives on, having fun and adventures in old museums. Space Ape 8 is an ape that lives in space. These are just a few of the exciting characters that live in Jay Stephens' Land of Nod, a fantastic place where good times are the main goal and anything you can imagine is likely to happen!

item.title: [ 37] Hey voyagers, The sticky probably needs to be updated, I'll keep the thread
item.description:
Hey voyagers,

The sticky probably needs to be updated, I'll keep the thread open for suggestions:

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

/trv/ is a slow board, so don't expect immediate responses. CHECK THE CATALOG – you might find threads already discussing topics you're interested in.

Before asking for suggestions, tell /trv/ about your:
>Budget
>Interests
>Level of understanding of the local language(s)
This makes it easier to give quality advice. Of course, keep your posts travel related.

For all other matters:
General culture questions >>>/int/
Politics discussion >>>/pol/
Transportation discussion >>>/n/
Outdoors-related discussion >>>/out/

For more information about safety, planning and other miscellaneous topics, check out the pastebin:

GENERAL INFO:
https://pastebin.com/yR1SAr3s

Note: Discussions of prostitution or sex tourism are not permitted on /trv/.
